original: Elger, Ragnar Valentin, läroverksadjunkt, Sölvesborg, f. 5/1/90 i V. Sal-lerup, Malmöh. 1. G. 1. 19 m. Margit Sterner; 2. 34 m. Carla Hoeltje. Barn: Barbro f. 20, Ingrid 21, Karl-Henrik 24, Ulla 31, Kerstin Elisabeth 35, Anna Dorothea 37, d. 37, Cari-Axel Ragnar 38, Hans 41. — Mog:ex. i Lund 08, fil. kand. där 12, fil. mag. 14, stud. f. fil. lic., provår v. Gbgs h. latin 16, genomg. kurs f. äldre res :off. 28. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. 10, 30 o. 34, delvis m. stip. Fänrik i Norra skånska inf :-reg. res. 15, und:löjtn. 18, löjtn. 19, kapt. 32. Vik. andre lär. v. Birka folkhögsk. 15, vik. adj. där 27, bibi. 19-41 o. rektors sekr. 23-32, e. lär. v. navig:sk. i Härnösand 32-41, adj. i tyska o. eng. v. Sölvesborgs samreal-sk. sed. 41. RVO.
translated: Elger, Ragnar Valentin, school teacher, Sölvesborg, b. January 5th, 1890, in Västra Sallerup, Malmö. 1st marriage in 1919 to Margit Sterner, lasted 19 years. 2nd marriage in 1934 to Carla Hoeltje, lasted 34 years. Children: Barbro b. 1920, Ingrid b. 1921, Karl-Henrik b. 1924, Ulla b. 1931, Kerstin Elisabeth b. 1935, Anna Dorothea b. 1937 (died 1937), Cari-Axel Ragnar b. 1938, Hans b. 1941. Education: graduated from a secondary school in Lund in 1908, bachelor's degree in philosophy in 1912, master's degree in philosophy in 1914, studied for a doctoral degree in philosophy, completed a year of practical training in Latin in Gothenburg in 1916, completed a course for older reserve officers in 1928. Study trips to Germany in 1910, 1930, and 1934, partially funded by scholarships. Military service: appointed as a second lieutenant in the Northern Scanian Infantry Regiment in 1915, promoted to first lieutenant in 1918, promoted to captain in 1932. Work experience: substitute second teacher at Birka Folk High School in 1915, substitute teacher there in 1927, librarian from 1919 to 1941, secretary to the principal from 1923 to 1932, permanent teacher in navigation school in Härnösand from 1932 to 1941, teacher of German and English at Sölvesborgs Samrealskola since 1941. Award: received the Order of Vasa (RVO).
